your_browser_does_not_support_the_video_: Your browser does not support the video tag.
what_is_ags_description: IGaming AFRIKA Summit is Africa’s mega gaming event, designed to unite the entire gaming industry players across the world in one place—the stunning city of Nairobi. This being the inaugural edition of the summit, the event is seen to be the largest event in the industry, taking place in Naironi in 2026, the summit is seen to be the mother of all gaming conferences in Africa.The summit is taking place in an impressive 3,300m² square meters location at Sarit Center Expo, Nairobi’s Largest Expo center giving exhibitors and attendees a massive ground to showcase their products, meet and connect with industry players as we discuss the future of the gaming industry in Africa.

sms_delivery_note: These are delivered via SMS to your mobile phone
push_description: Get notified on the latest gaming news in Africa.
news_description: Get notified about event changes and news.
general_notifications_note: We'll always let you know about important changes, but you pick what else you want to hear about.
register_ags_2026: Register for the 2026 Africa Gaming Summit
